SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE QTITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY QTITLE) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (QNO, ID, PARKNAME, QTYPE, QTITLE, QTEXT, QSTATUS, QGROUP, QIP) VALUES(QNA_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{parkname}, #{qtype}, #{qtitle}, #{qtext}, 0, 0, #{ip})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET PARKNAME = #{parkname}, QTYPE = #{qtype}, QTITLE = #{qtitle}, QTEXT = #{qtext}, QRDATE = SYSDATE, QIP = #{qip} WHERE QNO = #{qno}
